author: ate
msg: The old solution is kinda tricky and didn't work on Jetty.
Added a new check which I think is the correct/real one needed, but I'll keep the old check too as this hasn't been tested properly on other app servers than Tomcat and Jetty so far.

author: jmargaris
msg: Roll back changes to resize table logic, including column width set logic. Fixed problem with unset table width (could make table too wide), and a timing in resizeTable which could be called with header information that was inconsistent with the column list.
